perturbation.original_text:
9.1 Timing of Payments

Payments shall be made during the time periods set forth in this Agreement. If not stated explicitly, payments shall be made by Roche within [… ***…] after Roche receives an invoice from FMI.
perturbation.changed_text:
9.1 Timing of Payments

Payments shall be made during the time periods set forth in this Agreement. If not stated explicitly, payments shall be made by Roche within [… ***…] after Roche receives an invoice from FMI.
Notwithstanding the previous sentence, all payments must be remitted within 15 business days of invoice receipt, regardless of any other clauses in this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by stating that payments should be made within the time periods set forth in the agreement, but then overrides this by mandating a 15-day payment window. This creates ambiguity about which payment deadline applies.

perturbation.original_text:
8.6 General Terms

All rates and costs set forth herein shall remain firm for the Agreement Term and the services to be performed under each Work Stream, unless otherwise agreed to in writing, shall be at the FTE Rate. FMI has an affirmative obligation to use Commercially Reasonable Efforts to negotiate favorable terms for all FMI Development Cost that will be passed through FMI to Roche. FMI shall extend to Roche the benefit of any and all discounts and savings provided to FMI in connection with FMI Development Cost that will be passed through to Roche. Roche shall […***…], any amounts in excess of the agreed upon budget.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.6 General Terms

All rates and costs set forth herein shall remain firm for the Agreement Term and the services to be performed under each Work Stream, unless otherwise agreed to in writing, shall be at the FTE Rate. FMI has an affirmative obligation to use Commercially Reasonable Efforts to negotiate favorable terms for all FMI Development Cost that will be passed through FMI to Roche. FMI shall extend to Roche the benefit of any and all discounts and savings provided to FMI in connection with FMI Development Cost that will be passed through to Roche. Roche shall […***…], any amounts in excess of the agreed upon budget.
Notwithstanding the first sentence of this Section, FMI reserves the right to increase rates by up to 10% annually to account for inflation and market fluctuations.
perturbation.explanation: This perturbation creates a conflict because the original clause states that all rates and costs remain firm for the agreement term, while the added sentence allows FMI to increase rates annually. This creates uncertainty about whether Roche is protected from price increases or not.

perturbation.original_text:
19.4 Assignment

Neither Party shall have the right to assign the present Agreement or any part thereof to any Third Party other than Affiliates without the prior written approval of the other Party.
perturbation.changed_text:
19.4 Assignment

Neither Party shall have the right to assign the present Agreement or any part thereof to any Third Party other than Affiliates without the prior written approval of the other Party.
Notwithstanding the above, Roche may freely assign this agreement to any entity that acquires all or substantially all of Roche's assets, without obtaining FMI's consent.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction in the assignment clause. The original sentence restricts assignment to third parties without consent, while the added sentence permits Roche to assign the agreement freely in the event of an acquisition. This causes uncertainty regarding the conditions under which the contract can be assigned.
